text: Benjamin Franklin Tilley (March 29, 1848 in Bristol, Rhode Island â€“ March 18, 1907 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania) was an admiral in the US Navy who served in the American Civil War and the Spanish-American War. He was the first acting governor of American Samoa. ==References== Category:1848 births Category:1907 deaths Category:American admirals Category:American military personnel of the Spanish-American War Category:Governors of American Samoa Category:Military personnel of the American Civil War Category:Politicians from Rhode Island Category:Military people from Rhode Island
title: Benjamin Franklin Tilley
